description.zh-cn: 台湾一部政治剧集，为《国际桥牌社》之第二季，剧情聚焦1994年至1996年间，以1996年中华民国总统选举和台湾海峡飞弹危机为故事背景展开。
description.en: A Taiwanese political drama series, the second season of 'Island Nation', focusing on the period from 1994 to 1996, set against the backdrop of the 1996 ROC presidential election and the Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 1995年至1996年间，中华人民共和国在美国总统克林顿允许时任中华民国总统李登辉访问美国后，进行的一系列军事演习，影响了1996年中华民国总统选举。该事件是电视剧《国际桥牌社2》的故事背景之一。
description.en: A series of military exercises conducted by the People's Republic of China from 1995 to 1996 after U.S. President Clinton allowed ROC President Lee Teng-hui to visit the United States, which influenced the 1996 ROC presidential election. This event is one of the story backdrops for the TV series 'Island Nation 2'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第九任总统、副总统选举，也是中华民国首次在台湾、澎湖、金门、马祖举行之总统公民直选。该事件是电视剧《国际桥牌社2》的故事背景之一。
description.en: The ninth presidential and vice-presidential election of the Republic of China, and the first direct presidential election held in Taiwan, Penghu, Kinmen, and Matsu. This event is one of the story backdrops for the TV series 'Island Nation 2'.

nodes.id: 1995年李登辉总统康乃尔大学之行

zh-cn: 1995年李登辉总统康乃尔大学之行

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统李登辉于1995年访问其母校康乃尔大学，成为首位访问美国的中华民国现任元首。此行引发了北京的强烈反应，导致了台湾海峡飞弹危机。该事件是电视剧《国际桥牌社2》的剧情重点。
description.en: ROC President Lee Teng-hui's visit to his alma mater, Cornell University, in 1995, making him the first incumbent ROC head of state to visit the United States. The trip provoked a strong reaction from Beijing, leading to the Taiwan Strait Crisis. This event is a key plot point in the TV series 'Island Nation 2'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型为“黎清波”。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as President of the Republic of China. His prototype character in the TV series 'Island Nation 2' is 'Li Qing-bo'.

description.zh-cn: 一起发生在中国浙江省杭州市淳安县千岛湖的抢劫杀人案，造成24名台湾游客死亡，事件处理过程引发台湾方面强烈不满，严重影响两岸关系。该事件是电视剧《国际桥牌社2》的剧情原型之一。
description.en: A robbery and murder case that occurred in Qiandao Lake, Chun'an County, Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province, China, resulting in the deaths of 24 Taiwanese tourists. The handling of the incident caused strong dissatisfaction in Taiwan and severely affected cross-strait relations. This event is one of the story prototypes in the TV series 'Island Nation 2'.

description.zh-cn: 一本预言海峡两岸将在1995年农历闰八月爆发战争的书籍。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其原型为《1995正九月》一书。
description.en: A book that predicted a war across the Taiwan Strait in the intercalary eighth month of the 1995 lunar calendar. Its prototype in the TV series 'Island Nation 2' is the book '1995 Zheng Jiuyue'.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军少将，因在六四事件中对军队镇压学生不满，后成为台湾的间谍，在台湾海峡飞弹危机期间提供了关键情报。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型为“游建军”。
description.en: A major general in the People's Liberation Army who, dissatisfied with the military's suppression of students in the Tiananmen Square protests, later became a spy for Taiwan, providing crucial intelligence during the Taiwan Strait Crisis. His prototype character in the TV series 'Island Nation 2' is 'You Jian-jun'.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在北京天安门广场的抗议示威活动，最终遭到解放军的武力清场。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，该事件是角色“游建军”（原型为刘连昆）决定为台湾提供情报的动机。
description.en: Protests that took place in Beijing's Tiananmen Square in 1989, which were ultimately suppressed by the People's Liberation Army. In the TV series 'Island Nation 2', this event is the motivation for the character 'You Jian-jun' (prototype Liu Liankun) to provide intelligence to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的共和制国家，亦是电视剧《国际桥牌社2》故事发生的主要地点。
description.en: A republic in East Asia, and the main setting for the story of the TV series 'Island Nation 2'.

nodes.id: 马克吐温国际影像公司

zh-cn: 马克吐温国际影像公司

description.zh-cn: 电视剧《国际桥牌社2》的制作公司。
description.en: The production company for the TV series 'Island Nation 2'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事及政治人物，曾任行政院院长。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型为“楚长青”，描述其与李登辉掌权后的国民党理念不合。
description.en: A military and political figure of the Republic of China who served as Premier. His prototype character in the TV series 'Island Nation 2' is 'Chu Chang-qing', depicted as having ideological differences with the KMT under Lee Teng-hui's leadership.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台湾省省长。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型为“钟主谕”，剧中描述其与“陆中华”（原型连战）不和。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Governor of Taiwan Province. His prototype character in the TV series 'Island Nation 2' is 'Zhong Zhu-yu', depicted as being at odds with 'Lu Zhong-hua' (prototype Lien Chan).

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任行政院院长、副总统。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型为“陆中华”，剧中描述其与“钟主谕”（原型宋楚瑜）不和。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who served as Premier and Vice President. His prototype character in the TV series 'Island Nation 2' is 'Lu Zhong-hua', depicted as being at odds with 'Zhong Zhu-yu' (prototype James Soong).

description.zh-cn: 台湾黑道分子和政治人物，曾任屏东县议会议长，因枪杀钟源峰而闻名。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型为“周定荣”。
description.en: A Taiwanese gangster and politician who served as the Speaker of the Pingtung County Council, known for the murder of Chung Yuan-feng. His prototype character in the TV series 'Island Nation 2' is 'Zhou Ding-rong'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一家报社。其屏东分社曾因报导郑太吉涉嫌弊案而遭其率众捣毁。
description.en: A newspaper in Taiwan. Its Pingtung branch was once vandalized by a group led by Cheng Tai-chi after reporting on his alleged involvement in a corruption case.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人。在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型为“白羽”，时任福建省第二办公室书记。
description.en: The paramount leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. His prototype character in the TV series 'Island Nation 2' is 'Bai Yu', serving as the secretary of the 'Second Fujian Office'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾摇滚乐团，为电视剧《国际桥牌社2》谱写并演唱主题曲《同岛一命》。
description.en: A Taiwanese rock band that composed and performed the theme song 'Common Fate' for the TV series 'Island Nation 2'.

relationships.source: 马克吐温国际影像公司

description.zh-cn: 马克吐温国际影像公司是《国际桥牌社2》的制作公司。
description.en: Mark Twain International Video Company is the production company for 'Island Nation 2'.

description.zh-cn: 《国际桥牌社2》以台湾海峡飞弹危机作为其主要故事背景之一。
description.en: 'Island Nation 2' uses the Taiwan Strait Crisis as one of its main story backdrops.

description.zh-cn: 《国际桥牌社2》以1996年中华民国总统选举作为其主要故事背景之一。
description.en: 'Island Nation 2' uses the 1996 ROC presidential election as one of its main story backdrops.

relationships.source: 1995年李登辉总统康乃尔大学之行

description.zh-cn: 《国际桥牌社2》的剧情聚焦于1995年李登辉总统访问康乃尔大学等事件。
description.en: The plot of 'Island Nation 2' focuses on events including President Lee Teng-hui's 1995 visit to Cornell University.

description.zh-cn: 《国际桥牌社2》的剧情包含以千岛湖事件为原型的“百泽湖事件”。
description.en: The plot of 'Island Nation 2' includes the 'Baize Lake Incident', which is based on the Qiandao Lake Incident.

relationships.source: 1995年李登辉总统康乃尔大学之行

description.zh-cn: 李登辉对康奈尔大学的访问激怒了北京，是引发台湾海峡飞弹危机的直接导火索。
description.en: Lee Teng-hui's visit to Cornell University angered Beijing and was the direct trigger for the Taiwan Strait Crisis.

relationships.target: 1995年李登辉总统康乃尔大学之行

description.zh-cn: 李登辉作为时任中华民国总统访问了其母校康乃尔大学。
description.en: As the incumbent President of the Republic of China, Lee Teng-hui visited his alma mater, Cornell University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在台湾海峡进行的军事演习意在影响1996年中华民国总统选举的结果。
description.en: The military exercises conducted by the People's Liberation Army in the Taiwan Strait were intended to influence the outcome of the 1996 ROC presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》的剧情中，六四事件中解放军镇压学生的行为是促使角色“游建军”（原型刘连昆）决定成为台湾内应的关键原因。
description.en: In the plot of 'Island Nation 2', the PLA's suppression of students during the Tiananmen Square protests was the key reason that motivated the character 'You Jian-jun' (prototype Liu Liankun) to become an informant for Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 刘连昆向中华民国方面提供了包括台湾海峡飞弹危机在内的关键军事情报。
description.en: Liu Liankun provided crucial military intelligence to the Republic of China, including information related to the Taiwan Strait Crisis.

description.zh-cn: 在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型“楚长青”被描述为与黎清波（原型李登辉）掌权后的中国国家党背道而驰。
description.en: In the TV series 'Island Nation 2', his prototype character 'Chu Chang-qing' is described as being at odds with the KMT under the leadership of 'Li Qing-bo' (prototype Lee Teng-hui).

description.zh-cn: 在电视剧《国际桥牌社2》中，其角色原型“钟主谕”（原型宋楚瑜）与“陆中华”（原型连战）不和。
description.en: In the TV series 'Island Nation 2', his prototype character 'Zhong Zhu-yu' (prototype James Soong) is depicted as being at odds with 'Lu Zhong-hua' (prototype Lien Chan).

description.zh-cn: 时任屏东县议长的郑太吉因不满《民众日报》报导其涉赌，率众捣毁报社屏东分社。该事件在《国际桥牌社2》中有相应情节。
description.en: Cheng Tai-chi, then Speaker of the Pingtung County Council, was dissatisfied with a report in the Min Chung Daily News about his alleged gambling and led a group to vandalize the newspaper's Pingtung branch. This incident is depicted in 'Island Nation 2'.

description.zh-cn: 董事长乐团为电视剧《国际桥牌社2》谱写并演唱了主题曲《同岛一命》。
description.en: The Chairman band composed and performed the theme song 'Common Fate' for the TV series 'Island Nation 2'.
